sections.heading: We will never:
items: Write your essay or personal statement
Complete creative prompts on your behalf
Generate content you can copy and submit
Paraphrase content to disguise AI authorship

sections.heading: We will always:
items: Suggest ways to improve clarity and structure
Give you full control to review and edit before submission

refusal_message.heading: If you ask us to write your essay:
refusal_message.message: I can't write or complete scholarship essays for you. I can help you organize your ideas, improve clarity, and check structure. Upload your draft and I'll coach you on edits.

footer.text: Scholar AI Advisor operates on the "Editor/Coach, not Ghostwriter" principle. Your voice, your story, your success.
